name: Foosio
description:
Foosio is a daily fantasy football game. Choose a fixture, choose 4 players, sub them live and watch them score in real time. Play with your friends or join a public competition trying to win with your team! 

Show you are the best manager out there and compete with thousands of player around the globe in Bundesliga, Premier League, Primera Divison, Serie A or Ligue 1 matches. Additionally you can play Europa League and Champions League fixtures on Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursdays.

There is a match going on almost every day of the year and you can be the manager for 90minutes!

Play Foosio!
